step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the stretch.
Ensure your arm stays extended overhead throughout the movement.
Open your hand and fingers wide, feeling the stretch.
Make a tight fist while inhaling. Remember to visualize fluid moving.
Second rep, keep that arm straight overhead and feel the resistance.
Maintain arm extension. Focus on the pumping action.
Wide open hand and fingers. Good stretch!
Exhale as you relax your hand. You're doing great!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and extend your fingers wide. Squeeze your fist tightly while inhaling, and relax while exhaling to help move fluid.
